about_the_game:
Game Overview

Reignite your passion and experience a love without regret.

No matter how many times, I always want to embrace you, for only then can I avoid being lost in the long nights of rain and snow.

In 2024, we present with heartfelt craftsmanship, "I've Fallen For You!" Once again, let your passion be stirred and experience a profound and regretless love.

I may never see the moon at noon, but I know it is always there.

Just like your heart, I may never touch it, yet I can always feel it clearly.

Eight women simultaneously appear in your life, offering you unconditional love and support!

Will you choose to uphold your beliefs and become a good man, or give in to human temptations and become a bad man?

Character Introduction

Yu Anxia#Puppy Love #Gentle as Water

Wang Yi Chen#Cute Girl #Deep Sibling Bond

Tracy#Hong Kong-style Milf #Confident＆Independent

Song Jing#Mature Lady #Childhood Sweetheart

Kawase Nana#Japanese Girl #Money-oriented

Jiang Mi#Fashion Reporter #Innocent＆Sweet

Selina#Blonde Executive #Adorable yet Knowledgeable

Xu Xinqing#Scheming Heiress #Wealthy＆Cunning

Game Features

A Gathering of Beauties from Various Places, Encounter Enchanting Scenery

Popular beauties from different regions come together, each showcasing their unique charm and allure. From the adorable girl-next-door to the fiery DJ, the fierce and commanding lady, and the pure, innocent beauty, an array of captivating personas creates a dazzling mosaic that will leave you enchanted and mesmerized.

Immerse Yourself and Experience the Waves of Love

Feel the immersive sensation as if you were there in the first person. In this unique experience, it will seem as though you are truly part of it, feeling every subtle detail and every emotional wave. This total engagement will draw you in, immersing you deeply, making it hard to pull away.

Emotional Roller Coaster Storyline, Surprises and Tears

Witness the adorable journey of a blonde female executive in her professional life, the emotional conquest of a fierce lady boss, the passionate beats of a fiery DJ, the deep bonds of a sweet sister, and the heartfelt promises of an exceptionally charming young beauty. Each character plays an indispensable role in the storyline, adding layers of surprise and emotion.

Nested Multiple Endings, Collect Precious Memories

Different choices in the game will lead to various endings, including normal endings, perfect endings, hidden endings, and Easter egg endings, which are interwoven and triggered in different ways. This provides players with a rich gaming experience. Explore multiple clues, experience various endings, challenge your decision-making skills, and enjoy the endless fun the game brings!

Random Fun Games, Endless Surprises and Joy

Dive into delightful mini-games that break away from rigid fixed choices. The outcome is entirely based on luck, making every decision an unpredictable adventure. Unlock mysterious paths and discover a series of surprising and exciting storylines that keep you on your toes!

Exclusive Music Album: Diary of Memories

Every song is a beautiful memory, each with a touching story. The perfect blend of storyline and music creates an enchanting experience where the melodies and lyrics capture the essence of each love story. The album is infused with rich emotional elements, taking listeners on a journey through heartfelt memories.

highlighted.name: I can't do anything about you

content_descriptors.notes: Some videos and dialogues in the game may contain "revealing clothing," "sexual innuendo," "drinking," "adult venues" (such as bars, gyms, hot springs), etc., which may not be suitable for all ages.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card recommended.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Sonoma 14 or later
  • Processor: Apple M series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: edicated graphics card or M series integrated graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

name: I've Fallen For You!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card recommended.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • VR Support: NO
  • Additional Notes:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card recommended.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • VR Support: NO
  • Additional Notes:
